title: (x) Sans w/ short descenders - Heisei Kaku Gothic W5/Roman alphabet {Rainer}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322223854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hmmmmmmmmm_3564.png)

From a look-book designed by Value and Service...

Anybody got a clue?
author: zacharyohlman

comments.content:
I think we've had this before, but I can't remember if it was identified.

- Lex
Nope, it wasn't. It looks like a modified News Gothic, but it possibly is a custom typeface.

Look, what codeman38 discovered: Heisei Kaku Gothic W5/Roman alphabet. At [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322223854/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=45280) there is more info.

Ah! Thank you.

I had wondered about it being something like that.  
Anyway, thanks for the help. I can stop obsessing.
